name: Lion's Claw
mod_info: Jump into a frontward flip then slam your armament down in front of you as you land.
vanilla_info:
Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn.
Somersault forwards, striking foes with armament.

name: Impaling Thrust
mod_info: Thrust armament forward with enough force to pierce an enemy's guard.
vanilla_info: Skill that lets piercing armaments overcome enemy shields. Build power, then lunge forward for a strong thrust that pierces an enemy's guard.

name: Piercing Fang
mod_info: Starting with the blade held horizontally over your head, thrust armament forward with enough force to pierce an enemy's guard.
vanilla_info:
Skill used by Yura, the Bloody Finger Hunter.
Starting with the blade held horizontally, make a powerful thrust that cannot be blocked.

name: Spinning Slash
mod_info: Spin around in a circle then slash your armament in front of you. Follow up by using the skill a second time to perform two more spins, each with their own forward slash.
vanilla_info:
Skill favored by dexterous warriors.
Slash foes as your body spins. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

name: Charge Forth
mod_info: Charge forward with the armament held out in front of you, then thrust the armament forward with force. Hold to charge farther.
vanilla_info:
Quickly charge forward with the armament at the hip, carrying the momentum into a thrust.
Hold to cover a greater distance.

name: Stamp (Upward Cut)
mod_info: Stomp forward and briefly brace for an incoming attack. While in this stance <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> is reduced by 50% and you are much less likely to stagger from getting hit. Follow up with a strong attack to do an upward strike, which may knock some enemies into the air.
vanilla_info:
Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks.
Follow up with a strong attack for an upward strike.

name: Stamp (Sweep)
mod_info: Stomp forward and briefly brace for an incoming attack. While in this stance <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> is reduced by 50% and you are much less likely to stagger from getting hit. Follow up with a strong attack to do a horizontal slash in a full circle around you.
vanilla_info:
Brace armament and step into a low stance that prevents recoil from most enemy attacks.
Follow up with a strong attack for a sweeping strike.

name: Blood Tax
mod_info: Spin around in a circle then rapidly thrust your armament forward 4 times. Each of the first 3 thrusts that hit an enemy will restore 2% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 25, and the final thrust will restore 4% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 45 if it hits an enemy.
vanilla_info:
Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood.
Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts that rob the target of both their blood and their HP.

name: Repeating Thrust
mod_info: Spin around in a circle then rapidly thrust your armament forward 4 times.
vanilla_info: Twist to build power, then unleash a flurry of thrusts.

name: Wild Strikes
mod_info: Swing armament in an X-shaped pattern. Hold to coninue swinging. Can be used while moving. Follow up with a normal attack to do a horizontal slash in a full circle around you. Alternatively, follow up with a strong attack to raise your armament and do a downward vertical slash.
vanilla_info:
Swing armament with wild abandon.
Hold to continue swinging. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack.

name: Spinning Strikes
mod_info: Raise armament above your head and spin it in a circle horizontally, which can deflect small physical projectiles. Hold to continue spinning it. Can be used while moving and camera can be used to control angle. Follow with a normal attack to do a horizontal slash in a full circle around you, ending with a second slash forward. Alternatively, follow with a strong attack to leap forward and slam the armament downward in front of you.
vanilla_info: Polearm skill that performs continuous spinning attacks. Hold to continue the attack. Can be followed up with a normal or strong attack. Nullifies projectiles such as arrows while spinning.

name: Double Slash
mod_info: Step forward and slash your armament forward twice in an X-shaped pattern. Follow up by using the skill a second time to perform three more slashes. Follow that up by using the skill a third time to do a powerful downward slash.
vanilla_info:
Skill of superior swordsmen.
Perform a crossing slash attack from a low stance.
Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

name: Prelate's Charge
mod_info: Raise and ignite armament before slamming it into the ground and charging forward, leaving behind a trail of flames which will linger for a short time. At the end of the charge, rip the armament out of the ground with enough force to knock some enemies into the air. Hold to continue charging.
vanilla_info:
Slam armament into the ground to create a surge of flames, then charge in.
Hold to continue the charge.

name: Unsheathe
mod_info: Sheathe armament in preparation for an attack. Hold to keep weapon sheathed. Can be used while moving. Follow up with a normal attack to quickly step forward while doing a horizontal slash. Alternatively, follow up with a strong attack to do a small hop forward while doing a downward vertical slash.
vanilla_info:
Skill of swordsmen from the Land of Reeds.
Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance.
Follow up with a normal or strong attack to perform a swift slash attack.

name: Square Off
mod_info: Hold armament in a raised position in preparation for an attack. Follow up with a normal attack to do an upward vertical slash through an enemy's guard. Alternatively, follow up with a strong attack to run forward a few steps and thrust the armament forward.
vanilla_info:
This skill starts with the sword held level.
Follow up with a normal attack to slash upwards through enemy's guard, or a strong attack to perform a running thrust.

name: Giant Hunt
mod_info: Step forward and do a powerful upward thrust, which may knock some enemies into the air.
vanilla_info:
Skill developed for confronting gigantic foes.
Step forward from a low stance, carrying the momentum into a sudden upward thrust.

name: Torch Attack
mod_info: Thrust armament forward. Follow up by using the skill a second time to do a horizontal slash.
vanilla_info:
Thrust torch forward to set foes ablaze.
This skill is especially effective against foes who are weak to fire.

name: Loretta's Slash
mod_info: Imbue the armament with glintstone magic and do an upward slash as you jump into the air, then do a horizontal slash as you return to the ground.
vanilla_info:
Skill of Loretta the Royal Knight.
Leap forward, imbuing the blade with glintstone, then descend, accelerating into a sweeping slash.

name: Poison Moth Flight
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with poison then leap foward and do a horizontal slash. If an enemy hit by this skill is already poisoned then this will inflict additional damage equal to 5% of the enemy's <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 250, but the poison ailment will then be removed from the enemy.

<font color="#40BF40">Poison:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.14% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 14, every second for 30 seconds.

<font color="#40BF40">Base poison accumulation:</font> 250
vanilla_info:
Slash with a poison-infused blade.
If the follow-up strike lands on a poisoned foe, it will deal significant damage.

name: Spinning Weapon
mod_info: Telekinetically lift armament in front of you and spin it vertically several times. Can be used while moving.
vanilla_info:
Defensive skill employed by Carian princesses.
Lifts armament into mid-air, then makes it spin violently. Those it touches will suffer successive attacks.

name: Storm Assault
mod_info: Produce a swirl of harmful wind around you as you leap into the air then slam your armament into the ground, producing another swirl of wind where you land.
vanilla_info:
One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil.
Leap forward through surrounding storm winds and thrust armament downward. The attack will produce more storm winds at the point of impact.

name: Stormcaller
mod_info: Spin armament in circles above your head to produce 3 successive swirls of harmful wind around you. Follow up by using the skill a second time to step forward and do 2 additional spins. Follow that up by using the skill a third time to step forward again and do another 2 additional spins.
vanilla_info: One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil. Spin armament to create surrounding storm winds. Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

name: Sword Dance
mod_info: Leap forward and quickly do 2 diagonal slashes. Follow up by using the skill a second time to do a downward vertical slash.
vanilla_info:
Quickly close in to perform a series of spinning upward slashes.
Follow up with an additional input to finish with a downward slash.

name: Spinning Chain
mod_info: Hold the flail out in front of you and spin the ball vertically. Hold to continue spinning. Can be used while moving. Follow up with a normal attack to lift the flail up and slam it to the ground in front of you. Follow up with a strong attack to do a horizontal swipe then lift the flail up and slam it to the ground in front of you.
vanilla_info:
Spins the striking part of a flail at high speed to attack.
Follow up with a normal or strong attack to link the momentum of this skill into a successive attack.

name: Glintblade Phalanx
mod_info:
Conjure 4 magical dagger projectiles which float above you and automatically shoot into an enemy when they are within range. Follow up with a strong attack to thrust the armamant forward.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (projectiles):</font> 47
vanilla_info: Skill used by the enchanted knights who served the Carian royal family. Form an arch of magic glintblades overhead, which will attack foes automatically. Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.

name: Sacred Blade
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with holy essence then swing it horizontally to shoot a golden arc projectile. The armament retains its holy essence for 40 seconds, adding 90 <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font>.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (projectile):</font> 180
vanilla_info:
Grants armament's attacks holy essence and fires off a golden blade projectile.
The armament retains its holy essence for a while.

name: Ice Spear
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with cold magic then thrust it forward to cast the cold magic as a projectile.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (projectile):</font> 230
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (projectile):</font> 160
vanilla_info:
Skill of the warriors who served Lunar Princess Ranni.
Spin armament to release cold magic, then channel it into a piercing spear of ice.

name: Glintstone Pebble
mod_info:
Shoot a single magic glintstone projectile. Follow up with a strong attack to thrust the armamant forward while it's still imbued with glintstone magic.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (projectile):</font> 137
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (thrust):</font> 45
vanilla_info:
Skill that employs the glintstone sorcery of the same name.
Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust, performed while the armament is still imbued with glintstone.

name: Bloody Slash
mod_info:
Inflict damage on yourself equal to 5% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 50, then do an upward slash with your armament. The upward slash will produce a large arc of blood, extending the range of the attack.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#C84343">Base blood loss accumulation:</font> 60
vanilla_info:
Blood Oath skill granted by the Lord of Blood.
From a low stance, coat the blade in your own blood to unleash a rending blood slash in a wide arc.

name: Lifesteal Fist
mod_info: Crouch and build up power then thrust armament forward. If an enemy of human build is caught by this attack you will siphon health from the enemy and continuously deal damage to them for a short time. While siphoning you will restore 5% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> 3 times, then 15% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> once, for a total of 30%. If an enemy of non-human build is hit by this you will only do a slight amount of damage once and not be healed at all.
vanilla_info:
Skill that demonstrates mastery of the art of controlling vital energies.
A slow, controlled punch with an energy-infused fist that renders foes unconscious and steals their HP. Only effective against foes of human build.

name: Eruption
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with fire then slam it into the ground and rip it back out, leaving behind a small pool of magma for a few seconds.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (magma):</font> 40
vanilla_info:
Skill of the knights who serve at Volcano Manor.
Slam armament into the ground, spawning roiling lava which spouts up upon release.

name: Prayerful Strike
mod_info:
Raise armament and slam it into the ground in front of you. If it hits an enemy it will restore 30% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> and nearby allies will also have 30% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> restored.

Despite its name and appearance, this skill only inflicts <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font>, not <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font>.
vanilla_info:
Raise armament aloft in prayer, then slam it into the ground.
This inspired blow restores HP to the self and nearby allies if it successfully hits.

name: Gravitas
mod_info:
Plunge the armament into the ground and create a gravity well in a large area around yourself, which can pull some enemies towards you slightly and stagger them.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 60
vanilla_info:
Skill originating from the Alabaster Lords, who had skin of stone.
Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well.
In addition to dealing damage, this attack pulls enemies in.

name: Storm Blade
mod_info:
Imbue armament with a swirl of wind then slash it forward to cast it forward as a projectile. Can be used repeatedly to continue casting projectiles.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (projectile):</font> 150
vanilla_info:
Lost skill of Stormveil.
Surround armament with shearing storm winds that can be fired forward.
Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Earthshaker
mod_info:
Slam armament into the ground to create a shockwave in a large area around you. Follow up with a strong attack to spin armament in a full circle horizontal slash around you.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (shockwave):</font> 120
vanilla_info:
Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash an earth-shaking shockwave.
Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.

name: Golden Land
mod_info:
Slam armament into the ground to create a shockwave of sacred energy in a large area around you, which also produces 6 golden darts that will shoot out at an enemy. Follow up with a strong attack to spin armament in a full circle horizontal slash around you.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (shockwave):</font> 160
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (projectiles):</font> 75
vanilla_info: Thrust armament into the ground, then gather strength to unleash a blast of sacred energy that coalesces into golden darts. Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.

name: Flaming Strike
mod_info:
Throw out an arc of flame in front of you. Follow up with a strong attack to do a horizontal slash through the arc of fire, which will imbue the armament with 90 <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font> for 40 seconds.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (projectile):</font> 138
vanilla_info:
Skill that emits flame in a wide frontward arc.
Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lunging, sweeping strike.
This will also coat the armament in fire.

name: Thunderbolt
mod_info:
Raise armament to conjure a bolt of lightning from the sky. Can be used repeatedly to continue conjuring bolts of lightning.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (bolt):</font> 120
vanilla_info:
Skill used by the capital's ancient dragon cult.
Raise armament aloft to call down a bolt of lightning.
Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Lightning Slash
mod_info:
Stomp on the ground to conjure a bolt of lightning into your armament, which adds 85 <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> for 40 seconds, then slash it downward to conjure another bolt of lightning in front of you. The second lightning bolt produces a small explosion of lightning where it lands.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (bolt):</font> 120
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (explosion):</font> 60
vanilla_info:
Call down a bolt of lightning into armament, then swing it down to create an explosive shock.
The armament retains the lightning enchantment for a while.

name: Carian Grandeur
mod_info:
Raise your armament above your head and transform armament into a large magical greatsword, then slam it to the ground in front of you. Can be charged to increase damage and distance.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 220
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (partially charged):</font> 315
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (fully charged):</font> 400
vanilla_info:
Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill.
Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down.
Can be charged to increase its power by up to two levels.

name: Carian Greatsword
mod_info:
Raise your armament above your head and transform armament into a large magical greatsword, then slam it to the ground in front of you. Can be charged to increase damage and distance.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 220
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (charged):</font> 340
vanilla_info:
Carian royal prestige embodied in a skill.
Transform blade into a magical greatsword and swing it down.
Can be charged to increase its power.

name: Vacuum Slice
mod_info:
Raise the armament above your head and imbue it with wind, then slam it to the ground in front of you to cast it off as a vertical arc projectile.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (projectile):</font> 200
vanilla_info:
Lost skill of ancient heroes.
Hold the armament aloft to surround it with a shearing vacuum, then launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.

name: Black Flame Tornado
mod_info:
Spin the armament above your head while imbuing it with black flame, then slam it to the ground to create a large swirl of black flame around you. Hold to spin armament over your head longer, creating a large swirl of black flame around you before slamming it to the ground, creating another large swirl of black flame around you. In addition to the damage from the attack, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 1 per second for 2 seconds each time they are hit by the black flame.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (slam swirl):</font> 170
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (overhead swirl):</font> 65
vanilla_info:
Spin armament overhead and then plunge it into the ground to summon a raging vortex of black flames.
Hold to create an initial flame tornado while spinning the armament.

name: Sacred Ring of Light
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Sacred Ring of Light</font>
mod_info:
Slash weapon forward to conjure a ring of light which will fly toward an enemy. Can be used repeatedly to continue shooting projectiles.

The horizontal slash performed during this skill's animation doesn't do any damage.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (projectile):</font> 125
vanilla_info:
Skill used by the commanders of the Cleanrot Knights. Gather a sacred ring of light in the armament, then fire it forwards.
Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Firebreather
mod_info: Blow the torch's flame in a wide arc in front of you. If the flames touch the ground it will continue to burn on the ground for a short time.
vanilla_info: Blow into torch flame, spreading flames in a wide frontward arc. The flames on the ground will continue to burn for a short time.

name: Blood Blade
mod_info:
Inflict damage to yourself equal to 4% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> to imbue the armament with blood then swipe it horizontally to cast it as a projectile. Can be used repeatedly to cast mutliple projectiles without taking any additional damage.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (projectile):</font> 115
<font color="#C84343">Base blood loss accumulation (projectile):</font> 60
vanilla_info:
Wound self to coat the armament with blood, then unleash an airborne blood blade that causes hemorrhaging.
Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Phantom Slash
mod_info:
Summon an apparition next to you who will lunge forward and do an upward vertical slash, followed by you doing the same thing. Follow up by using the skill a second time to re-summon the apparition to do a downward vertical slash, followed by you doing the same thing.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (apparition, upward):</font> 160
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (apparition, downward):</font> 165
vanilla_info: Skill inspired by the fond remembrances of the Night's Cavalry. Creates an apparition of the knights' former instructor who guides a joint lunging upward swing. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

name: Spectral Lance
mod_info:
Transform armament into an apparition spear and hurl it forward.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 132
vanilla_info:
Skill of the headless Mausoleum Knights.
Hurl a phantasmic spear at foes.

name: Chilling Mist
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with frost and do a hortizontal slash to produce a cloud of cold mist for 4 seconds, which will cause <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> up to 6 times. The armament remains imbued with frost for 40 seconds, causing 30 <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> per attack.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of maximum HP plus 30, then increases all damage received by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (slash):</font> 60
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (mist):</font> 120
vanilla_info:
Coat armament in frost, and then slash, spreading frigid mist forwards.
The armament retains its frost for a while.

name: Poisonous Mist
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with poison and do a hortizontal slash to produce a cloud of poison for 4 seconds, which will cause <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font> up to 6 times. The armament remains imbued with poison for 40 seconds, causing 30 <font color="#40BF40">poison accumulation</font> per attack.

<font color="#40BF40">Poison:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.1% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 8, every second for 40 seconds.

<font color="#40BF40">Base poison accumulation (mist):</font>  60
<font color="#40BF40">Base poison accumulation (mist):</font>  120
vanilla_info:
Bathe armament in poison, and then slash, spreading toxic mist forwards.
The armament retains its poison for a while.

name: Shield Bash
mod_info: Lift shield to guard stance and ram it forward while maintaining guard. Some enemies may be knocked down or staggered.
vanilla_info:
Brace behind shield before using bodyweight to ram foes while maintaining guarding stance.
Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards, and can even be staggered.

name: Barricade Shield
mod_info: Lift shield to guard stance and imbue it with energy for 10 seconds, increasing <font color="#E0B985">guard boost</font> and increasing its ability to repel enemy attacks. The amount that <font color="#E0B985">guard boost</font> is increased by depends on the shield's base guard boost. Shields with a lower base value will get a bigger increase, while shields with a higher base value will get a smaller increase.
vanilla_info:
Skill made famous by Sir Neidhardt.
Focus your energy into the shield, temporarily hardening it to deflect greater blows.

name: Parry
mod_info:
Swing armament with precise timing to deflect a melee attack, which will break the enemy's stance, typically allowing for a critical attack. Not all melee attacks can be deflected.

This skill is not consistent on all armaments. The window of time to deflect is the earliest and longest on small shields and is slightly later and shorter on daggers. Compared to daggers, the window for most other armaments, including medium shields, begins at the same time but is half the duration, so it will require much more precise timing.
vanilla_info:
Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance.
This provides an opening to perform a critical hit.

name: Buckler Parry
mod_info: Swing armament with precise timing to deflect a melee attack, which will break the enemy's stance, typically allowing for a critical attack. Not all melee attacks can be deflected. Compared to a regular parry on a small shield, the window of time to deflect begins slightly earlier but is the same duration.
vanilla_info:
Use this skill in time with a foe's melee attack to deflect it and break that foe's stance.
This is faster than a regular parry.

name: Carian Retaliation
mod_info:
Swing armament with precise timing to transform an incoming spell into 3 magical daggers which float above you and automatically shoot into an enemy when they are within range. Can also deflect a melee attack, which will break the enemy's stance, typically allowing for a critical attack. Not all melee attacks can be deflected. Compared to a regular parry on a small shield, the window of time to deflect begins slightly earlier, is slightly longer, and is consistent for all armaments.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (projectiles):</font> 270
vanilla_info:
Swing the shield to dispel incoming sorceries and incantations, transforming the magic into retaliatory glintblades.
Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.

name: Storm Wall
mod_info: Swing armament with precise timing to deflect small physical projectiles. Can also deflect a melee attack, which will break the enemy's stance, typically allowing for a critical attack. Not all melee attacks can be deflected. Compared to a regular parry on a small shield, the window of time to deflect is the same but it is consistent for all armaments.
vanilla_info:
Swing the shield to create a wall of storm winds in front of you, deflecting arrows and other such physical projectiles.
Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.

name: Golden Parry
mod_info:
Swing armament with to project a large golden arc in front of you which, with precise timing, can deflect a melee attack, which will break the enemy's stance, typically allowing for a critical attack. Not all melee attacks can be deflected. Compared to a regular parry on a small shield, the window of time to deflect begins slightly earlier, is slightly longer, and is consistent for all armaments.

Effective even at a slight distance.
vanilla_info:
Perform an Erdtree incantation and swing the shield to deflect enemy attacks and break their stance.
Effective even at a slight distance.

name: Shield Crash
mod_info:
Lift shield to guard stance and charge forward while maintaining guard then ram the shield forward. Some enemies may be knocked down or staggered. Hold to charge forward longer.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 132
vanilla_info:
Two-hand the shield and charge forwards while maintaining guard. Weaker enemies will be shoved backwards and can even be staggered.
Hold to extend the duration of the charge forwards.

name: Thops's Barrier
mod_info: Swing armament with precise timing to deflect an incoming spell. Can also deflect a melee attack, which will break the enemy's stance, typically allowing for a critical attack. Not all melee attacks can be deflected. Compared to a regular parry on a small shield, the window of time to deflect begins slightly later, is slightly shorter, and is consistent for all armaments.
vanilla_info:
Erect a magical forcefield while swinging the shield to deflect sorceries and incantations.
Can also be used in the same way as a regular parry.

name: Through and Through
mod_info: Hold to stand in a prepared stance. Arrows shot while in this stance will pierce through enemies who aren't guarding, allowing multiple enemies in a straight line to be hit. Arrows will not pierce through shields.
vanilla_info:
Powerful archery skill using a greatbow held in an oblique stance.
Ready the greatbow, then twist the bowstring to fire a mighty greatarrow that can penetrate through enemies.

name: Barrage
mod_info: Hold to stand in a prepared stance. While in this stance you are able to shoot arrows without the usual delay of pulling back the string, allowing arrows to be shot in quick succession.
vanilla_info:
Archery skill using a bow held horizontally.
Ready the bow, then fire off a rapid succession of shots faster than the eye can see.

name: Mighty Shot
mod_info: Hold to stand in a prepared stance. Arrows shot while in this stance will have enough force to pierce an enemy's guard.
vanilla_info:
Archery skill performed from an oblique stance.
Ready the bow, then pull the bowstring to its limit to enhance the power of the shot, penetrating the enemy's guard.

name: Enchanted Shot
mod_info: Hold to stand in a prepared stance. Arrows shot while in this stance will change their trajectory to follow the target.
vanilla_info:
Archery skill that enlivens the arrow with spiritual essence.
The resulting shot will fly faster than regular shots and change its trajectory to follow the target.

name: Sky Shot
mod_info:
Hold to crouch in a prepared stance. Arrows shot while in this stance will be shot nearly straight up and arc to land where the target was standing when the arrow was shot, typically resulting in increased damage as a headshot.

It is very difficult to hit a moving enemy with this so it is much more useful to be used in stealth.
vanilla_info:
Archery skill performed from a low stance.
Ready the bow, then fire an arrow high up into the air, arcing so as to strike the enemy from above when it comes down.

name: Rain of Arrows
mod_info: Hold to crouch in a prepared stance. Arrows shot while in this stance will be shot nearly straight up and split into a barrage of arrows which will arc to land around the area where the target was standing when the arrow was shot.
vanilla_info:
Archery skill performed from a low stance.
Ready the bow, then fire a burst of arrows into the sky to shower the enemy with projectiles.

name: Hoarfrost Stomp
mod_info:
Stomp on the ground to produce a large cone of icicles along the ground, which briefly spray up a cold mist.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 40
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 70
vanilla_info:
Stomp hard to spread a trail of freezing mist on the ground.
The mist applies the frost status effect.

name: Storm Stomp
mod_info:
Stomp on the ground to produce a swirl of wind around you.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (wind):</font> 50
vanilla_info:
One of the skills that channel the tempests of Stormveil.
Stomp hard on the ground to kick up a momentary storm.

name: Kick
mod_info: Kick forward with force. Effective at breaking a guarding enemy's stance.
vanilla_info:
Push an enemy back with a high kick.
Effective against enemies who are guarding, and can break a foe's stance.
Sometimes a simple tool is the most effective.

name: Lightning Ram
mod_info:
Imbue your body with lightning and roll forward on the ground. Can be used repeatedly to continue rolling.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 40
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage:</font> 95
vanilla_info:
Skill inspired by tumbling rams.
Let out a bleat, then tumble forwards, clad in lightning.
Tumbles can be repeated in rapid succession.

name: Flame of the Redmanes
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Flame of the Redmanes</font>
mod_info:
Conjure a wide arc of fire in front of you and push it outward.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 180
vanilla_info:
Skill of the Redmanes, who fought alongside General Radahn.
Produce a powerful burst of flames in a wide frontward arc.

name: Ground Slam
mod_info:
Jump up into the air and slam back to the ground on your butt to create a large shockwave around you which may knock down nearby enemies.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 264
vanilla_info:
Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead.
The resulting pratfall sends a powerful shockwave in all directions.

name: Golden Slam
mod_info:
Jump up into the air and slam back to the ground on your butt to create a large shockwave of sacred energy around you which may knock down nearby enemies.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage:</font> 308
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 225
vanilla_info:
Skill of the avatars who protect Minor Erdtrees.
Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead.
The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions.

name: Waves of Darkness
mod_info:
Imbue armament with dark energy then slam it into the ground to release it as 3 shockwaves around you, each shockwave bigger than the last. Follow up with a strong attack to do a horizontal slash in a full circle around you.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (shockwaves):</font> 120
vanilla_info:
Plunge armament into the ground to release three waves of darkness.
Follow up with a strong attack to swing the armament in a sweeping strike.

name: Hoarah Loux's Earthshaker
mod_info:
Let out a loud scream which may stagger some enemies in a small area around you, then slam your hands to the ground to produce a shockwave around you. Follow up by using the skill a second time to slam the ground again.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (first shockwave):</font> 220
<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (second shockwave):</font> 250
vanilla_info:
Slam both hands onto the ground to violently shake the earth and unleash a shockwave.
Follow up with an additional input to slam the ground again.

name: Determination
mod_info: Imbue your armament with energy, increasing <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for your next single attack with that armament within 10 seconds by 60%. This effect works for critical attacks as well.
vanilla_info:
A knightly skill.
Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, powering up your next attack.

name: Royal Knight's Resolve
mod_info: Imbue your armament with energy, increasing <font color="#E0B985">all attack power</font> for your next single attack with that armament within 10 seconds by 80%. This effect works for critical attacks as well.
vanilla_info:
Skill of the knights who once served the Elden Lord.
Hold the flat of the armament to your face and pledge your resolve, greatly powering up your next attack.

name: Assassin's Gambit
mod_info: Become semi-invisible for 30 seconds, which reduces the range at which non-aggressive enemies will notice you by 60% and completely negates sound made during movement.
vanilla_info:
Skill that masks the user's presence at the cost of a self-inflicted wound.
Grants near-invisibility and silences footsteps.

name: Golden Vow
mod_info: Imbue yourself and nearby allies with sacred energy for 45 seconds, which increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 11.5% and <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 7.5%.
vanilla_info: Skill passed down from antiquity among the knights of the capital. Raise armament aloft and pledge to honor the Erdtree in battle, granting self and nearby allies increased attack power and defense.

name: Sacred Order
mod_info: Imbue armament with holy essence for 60 seconds, which increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 10%. Attacks against Those Who Live in Death will inflict 100% more damage and prevent them from reviving.
vanilla_info:
Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights.
Perform a salute and grant the armament holy essence.
Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.

name: Shared Order
mod_info: Imbue yourself and nearby allies with holy essence for 60 seconds, which increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 10% for you and 7.5% for nearby allies. Attacks against Those Who Live in Death will inflict 50% more damage and prevent them from reviving.
vanilla_info:
Skill of the Golden Order fundamentalist knights.
Grant the armament and those of nearby allies holy essence.
Highly effective against Those Who Live in Death.

name: Seppuku
mod_info:
Plunge armament into your stomach, inflicting damage to yourself equal to 15% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and clearing all <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font>. This imbues it with blood for 60 seconds, which adds 30 <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> and 30 <font color="#C84343">blood loss accumulation</font> to each attack.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.
vanilla_info: A forbidden technique used by swordsmen from the Land of Reeds. Plunge the blade into your stomach to stain it with blood. Increases attack power and improves ability to inflict blood loss.

name: Cragblade
mod_info: Plunge armament into the ground to reinforce it with rocks for 60 seconds, which increases <font color="#F395C4">physical damage</font> by 10%. It also increases the amount of stamina removed with each attack from enemies who are guarding by 20%, making it easier to break their stance.
vanilla_info:
Skill that manipulates gravity.
Bury the armament in the ground, pulling rocks from the earth to reinforce it. Increases attack power and makes it easier to break enemy stance.

name: Barbaric Roar
mod_info: Let out a loud scream which will increase your <font color="#F395C4">physical attack power</font> by 7.5% and your <font color="#E0B985">strength</font> by 5 for 40 seconds. It also changes your strong attack to be a 3-attack combination.
vanilla_info:
Let loose a bestial roar to rally the spirit and increase attack power.
While active, strong attacks change to savage combo attacks.

name: War Cry
mod_info: Let out a loud scream which will increase your <font color="#F395C4">physical attack power</font> by 7.5% and your <font color="#E0B985">strength</font> by 5 for 40 seconds. It also changes your strong attack to be a downward vertical slash, and changes your charged strong attack to be a short run forward followed by a downward vertical slash.
vanilla_info:
Give a war cry to rally the spirit and increase attack power.
While active, strong attacks change to charging attacks.

name: Beast's Roar
mod_info: Let out a loud scream which will produce a projectile of wind that will fly forward.
vanilla_info: Unleash a beastly roar, rending the air as a forward-travelling projectile.

name: Troll's Roar
mod_info: Stomp and let out a loud scream which will produce a large shockwave around you. Follow up with a strong attack to raise the armament above your head and slam it to the ground with force.
vanilla_info:
Look into the distance and let out an intense roar, generating a powerful shockwave that blows back surrounding foes.
Follow up with a strong attack to slam the armament down.

name: Braggart's Roar
mod_info: Let out a loud scream which will increase your <font color="#F395C4">physical attack power</font> by 10%, <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 10%, and increase <font color="#E0B985">stamina regeneration</font> by 10 per second for 60 seconds.
vanilla_info:
Declare your presence with a boastful roar.
Raises attack power, defense, and stamina recovery speed.

name: Endure
mod_info: Imbue your body with energy to brace for an incoming attack for 3.5 seconds, which increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 45%. Lighter physical attacks from enemies may cause the enemy to briefly stagger backwards after hitting you.
vanilla_info:
Assume an anchored stance to brace for incoming attacks, briefly boosting poise.
Damage taken while using this skill is reduced.

name: Vow of the Indomitable
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Vow of the Indomitable</font>
mod_info: Raise shield and imbue yourself with golden energy which makes you completely invincible for a brief moment.
vanilla_info:
Skill of the ancient warriors of the Erdtree.
Hold shield aloft to imbue yourself with golden power, granting momentary invincibility.

name: Holy Ground
mod_info: Raise shield and conjure a golden sigil on the ground for 35 seconds, which will reduce <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% and restore 5 HP every 0.3 seconds while standing in it. The effects also apply to allies that are standing within the sigil.
vanilla_info: Raise shield to create an Erdtree-consecrated area that continuously restores HP and boosts defense for self and allies inside it.

name: Quickstep
mod_info:
Perform a quick dodging maneuver. Lock-on to an enemy and hold left or right while using this skill to quickly circle around to the backside of them if you are standing close enough.

Having a light equipment load will allow you to get the farthest distance when using this skill. Using this skill repeatedly will reduce its effectiveness.
vanilla_info:
Skill prized by the crafty and fleet of foot.
Perform a quickstep maneuver that allows for circling around lock-on targets.

name: Bloodhound's Step
mod_info:
Become completely invisible while performing a quick dodging maneuver. Lock-on to an enemy and hold left or right while using this skill to quickly circle around to the backside of them if you are standing close enough. Compared to the regular quickstep skill, this skill is faster and you travel farther.

Having a light equipment load will allow you to get the farthest distance when using this skill. Using this skill repeatedly will reduce its effectiveness.
vanilla_info:
Skill that allows the user to become temporarily invisible while dodging at high speed. Moves faster and travels farther than a regular quickstep.
This skill can be used to circle around lock-on targets.

name: Raptor of the Mists
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Skill: Raptor of the Mists</font>
mod_info: Crouch to briefly brace for an incoming attack. If you are hit by an attack while in this stance <font color="#E0B985">all damage</font> is completely negated and you will automatically leap into the air, allowing you to easily retaliate with a jump attack.
vanilla_info:
Duck into a low stance, momentarily vanishing.
If an enemy attack connects, avian wings will allow for a quick escape into the air.

name: White Shadow's Lure
mod_info: Cast a pale shadow illusion which will lure human enemies outside of combat to attack it. Demi-humans will be lured in even during combat.
vanilla_info:
Hold armament in a brief, silent prayer to create a white shadow.
The apparition lures in foes of human build who are not in combat, drawing their aggression. Effective on demi-humans even if they are already in a combat state.

name: Surge of Faith
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Surge of Faith</font>
mod_info:
Raise armament and produce an explosion followed by a barrage of fireballs from the top which will rain down all around you. Can be used repeatedly to continue causing explosions and raining fireballs.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosion):</font> 230
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (fireballs):</font> 55
vanilla_info:
Set the flames of Birac's faith ablaze in the cranial vessel, then raise it aloft to rain down fireballs in all directions.
Repeated inputs will continue to raise the armament aloft, continuing the attack.

name: Flame Spit
mod_info:
Convert the shield into a ballista and shoot a large fireball which explodes on impact.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 385
vanilla_info:
Ready the shield, then launch a fireball from the barrel.
The fireball explodes on impact.

name: Tongues of Fire
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Tongues of Fire</font>
mod_info:
Hold to brace shield with both hands and spew a stream of fire forward. Can be used while moving.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage:</font> 150
vanilla_info:
Ready the shield, then spray violent jets of fire from the tongues protruding from its maw.
Hold to continue spraying fire. This skill can be used while walking.

name: Oracular Bubble
mod_info:
Blow the horn to produce a bubble which will float forward. Can be used repeatedly to continue casting bubbles.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 110
vanilla_info:
Blow on the horn to release a magic bubble.
The bubble floats gently through the air towards its target.

name: Bubble Shower
mod_info:
Blow the horn to produce a barrage of bubbles which will float down in front of you.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 65
vanilla_info:
Blow on the horn to release a spume of magic bubbles.
The bubbles float gently before raining down on the target.

name: Great Oracular Bubble
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Great Oracular Bubble</font>
mod_info:
Blow the horn to produce a large bubble which will float forward and explode on impact.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 315
vanilla_info:
Blow on the horn to release a massive magic bubble.
The bubble floats gently through the air towards its target.

name: Sea of Magma
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Sea of Magma</font>
mod_info:
Spin the whip in a circle over your head to spread pools of magma in every direction around you. Hold to continue spinning the whip.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (magma):</font> 66
vanilla_info:
Swing a molten whip overhead to temporarily cover the surrounding area in a sea of magma.
Hold to continue swinging the lava whip.

name: Viper Bite
mod_info:
Uncoil the snake on the shield so it can lunge forward with a poisonous bite.

<font color="#40BF40">Poison:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 0.14% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 14, every second for 30 seconds.

<font color="#40BF40">Base poison accumulation:</font> 250
vanilla_info: Give the shield a quick shake to temporarily bring the bronze viper to life, inciting it to lash out and bite foes.

name: Moonlight Greatsword
mod_info:
Raise the armament and imbue it with the light of the dark moon for 60 seconds, which adds 85 <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> and 100 <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> to each attack.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.
vanilla_info:
Raise the sword aloft, bathing it in the light of the dark moon.
Temporarily increases magic attack power and imbues blade with frost.
Charged attacks release blasts of moonlight.

name: Siluria's Woe
mod_info: Imbue the armament with energy then slam it into the ground in front of you to create an explosion. Charge to have a large projectile shoot out forward from the explosion, which can knock down some enemies. The projectile is capable of piercing through enemies and some objects.
vanilla_info:
Thrust the weapon in a spiraling motion, surrounding it in a vortex of wind.
Charged attacks have the power to blow away enemies and can fire the tornado forwards.

name: Rallying Standard
mod_info: Wave the banner to increase <font color="#E0B985">all damage</font> and <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 20% for 30 seconds for yourself and nearby allies.
vanilla_info:
Hoist the war banner aloft and give a rallying command.
Raises attack power and defense for self and nearby allies.

name: Bear Witness!
mod_info: Drag the armament along the ground into a fire-infused uppercut, then spew a barrage of fireballs into the air.
vanilla_info: Grant the small dragon a fleeting glimpse of life and thrust it skyward, spewing flames over a wide frontward area.

name: Eochaid's Dancing Blade
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Eochaid's Dancing Blade</font>
mod_info: Imbue the armament with red energy and throw it forward to spin in the air like a drill for a short time before returning to you, then do a horizontal swipe. Charging increases damage, reach, and duration.
vanilla_info:
Infuse the sword with energy, then fling it forwards in a corkscrew attack. The sword continuously deals damage while violently spinning.
Charge the attack to increase reach and duration of the spin.

name: Soul Stifler
mod_info: Raise the armament to conjure a soul-sapping miasma which will reduce <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 30% for 60 seconds for any enemy who touches it.
vanilla_info:
Raise the greathorn's wings to summon a soul-sapping miasma.
Enemies in the affected area will temporarily suffer from reduced defense.

name: Taker's Flames
mod_info: Raise the armament and imbue it with fire then slam it to the ground to cause a chain of fiery eruptions along the ground in a straight line. Each enemy hit by the fire will restore 10% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 150.
vanilla_info:
Raise the sacred sword aloft to set it ablaze with blasphemous flames, then bring it down to fire off a forward blast.
The flames steal HP from those they touch.

name: Shriek of Milos
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Shriek of Milos</font>
mod_info: Let out a loud scream along with a burst of golden energy all around you. This will increase your <font color="#F395C4">physical damage inflicted</font> by 7.5% for 20 seconds and also changes your strong attack to be a 3-attack combination during this time. Any enemy hit by the burst of golden energy will have <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> reduced by 15% for 30 seconds.
vanilla_info:
Lets out a horrific cursed scream that reduces all damage negation and status resistances for nearby foes.
While active, strong attacks will change to a combo attack.

name: Reduvia Blood Blade
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Reduvia Blood Blade</font>
mod_info:
Do a horizontal slash to produce an arc of blood which will shoot forward. Can be used repeatedly to continue shooting arcs of blood.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#C84343">Base blood loss accumulation:</font> 90
vanilla_info:
Slash with the wicked dagger, transforming its never-drying bloodstains into airborne blades that cause blood loss.
Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Glintstone Dart
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with glinstone magic then cast it forward as a projectile. The projectile is capable of piercing through some enemies. Charging increases damage. Follow up with a strong attack to thrust the armamant forward while it's still imbued with glintstone magic.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (projectile):</font> 155
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (projectile, charged):</font> 190
vanilla_info:
Skill that builds from the Glintstone Pebble sorcery.
Charge the skill to upgrade it to Glintstone Dart.
Follow up with a strong attack to chain this skill into a lunging thrust.

name: Flowing Form
mod_info: Convert the armament into a whip then do a very wide horizontal slash before returning it to its original form.
vanilla_info:
Temporarily transforms armament into its liquid form.
Swing the armament like a whip to perform a sweeping slice over a wide area.

name: Night-and-Flame Stance
mod_info: Hold armament in a raised position in preparation for an attack. Follow up with a normal attack to cast out a large beam of glintstone magic. Alternatively, follow up with a strong attack to imbue the armament with fire then do a horizontal slash to cast it out as a very wide arc of fire.
vanilla_info:
Hold the sword level and prepare to cast a sorcery.
Follow up with a normal attack to cast the Night Comet sorcery, or a strong attack to sweep forward with a burst of flames.

name: Wave of Gold
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Wave of Gold</font>
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with golden energy then slash it down towards your feet to produce a large golden arc on the ground which continues to grow significantly wider as it shoots forward. After the arc has traveled a certain distance away the damage is increased.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (short range):</font> 230
<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (long range):</font> 250
vanilla_info:
Imbue the sword with bygone golden glory, then fire it at foes.
A wide, golden wave fans out forwards, sweeping through all enemies caught in its path.

name: Ruinous Ghostflame
mod_info: Slash the armament in front of you to imbue it with ghostflame for 60 seconds, which adds 110 <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage</font> and 80 <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font> per attack.
vanilla_info:
Swing the sword to bathe its blade in ghostflame.
The ghostflame adds magic damage to attacks, and also has a bitterly cold bite.

name: Establish Order
mod_info: Raise armament and briefly imbue it with golden energy then release a large explosion of golden energy around you. Follow up by using the skill a second time to channel more golden energy into the armament before doing 2 quick horizontal slashes to cast the energy out as a wide arc projectile.
vanilla_info:
Raise the armament in a salute, releasing a golden explosion.
Repeated inputs send out waves of golden light.

name: Mists of Slumber
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Mists of Slumber</font>
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with purple energy before doing a horizontal slash to briefly produce a wide arc of purple mist. The armament retains its imbuement for 30 seconds, which adds 20 <font color="#A698F4">sleep accumulation</font> per attack.

<font color="#A698F4">Sleep:</font> Reduces FP by 30 then forces the enemy to sleep for 60 seconds, or until any damage is received, typically allowing for a critical attack.

<font color="#A698F4">Base sleep accumulation (mist):</font> 70
vanilla_info:
Releases a faint purple mist that spreads across a wide frontwards area.
This mist inflicts the sleep ailment upon foes.

name: Spearcall Ritual
mod_info: Raise armament to conjure a barrage of phantom Death Ritual Spears above the target to rain down on them.
vanilla_info: Thrust the spear high, bearing prayers into the sky to summon a downpour of spectral spears.

name: Wolf's Assault
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with magic frost then do a flip forward and plunge the armament into the ground to release an explosion of magic frost around you.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (plunge and explosion):</font> 50
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (plunge):</font> 100
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (explosion):</font> 60
vanilla_info: Infuse the greatsword with frost, then perform a forward somersault to plunge it into the ground. Then, pull it out to release a cold blast.

name: Thundercloud Form
mod_info: Briefly transform into a cloud of red lightning then emerge from the cloud with your armament imbued with the red lightning and plunge it into the ground, creating a small explosion of red lightning. Hold to glide through the in the cloud of red lightning form for a short distance.
vanilla_info:
Temporarily transform into a red thundercloud and fly through the air, then plunge down with a lightning-infused blade.
Hold to increase the reach of the thundercloud form.

name: Cursed-Blood Slice
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with fire then leap forward and do a diagonal slash. A red streak will form along the path of the slash, which will will then explode after a short delay. Follow up by using the skill a second time to do a horizontal slash while the armament is still imbued with flame, forming another exploding red streak.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosions):</font> 80
vanilla_info:
Brace, then charge forward to deliver a downward diagonal slice.
The bloody trail of the blade is followed by a burst of flame.
Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

name: Waterfowl Dance
mod_info: Float into the air briefly then leap forward and do 3 sets of extremely quick slashes all round you. Follow up by using the skill a second time to do 2 more sets of slashes. Follow that up by using the skill a third time to do 4 more sets of slashes.
vanilla_info:
Perform a series of one-footed leaps in the manner of a waterfowl to unleash a swift yet graceful slashing combo.
Repeated inputs allow for up to two follow-up attacks.

name: Gold Breaker
mod_info: Float into the air as you imbue the armament with light then smash it to the ground to create a large explosion of light. The explosion might throw some enemies into the air and knock them down.
vanilla_info:
Leap up high and, while suspended in midair, imbue the rune shard with light before smashing it down hard onto the ground.
The heroic Radagon's signature attack.

name: I Command Thee, Kneel!
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: I Command Thee, Kneel!</font>
mod_info: Smash armament into the ground 2 times, each time creating a large shockwave around you. Follow up by using the skill a second time to slam the armament into the ground again, creating a larger shockwave.
vanilla_caption: Unique Skill: I Command Thee, Kneel!
vanilla_info:
Repeatedly smash the Axe of Godrick into the ground, unleashing two earth-shaking shockwaves.
Follow up with an additional input to produce a third shockwave.

name: Regal Roar
mod_info: Let out a loud scream then build up power for a short time to stomp on the ground and release a large shockwave around you. The shockwave might throw some enemies into the air and knock them down. This also increases your <font color="#F395C4">physical attack power</font> by 7.5% for 40 seconds.
vanilla_info: Let loose a mighty war cry, raising attack power, while sending out a shockwave that cannot be guarded against by stomping the ground. While active, strong attack becomes a lunging slash.

name: Starcaller Cry
mod_info: Let out a loud scream while briefly imbuing both swords with gravitational energy, which may pull in and stagger some enemies near you. Follow up by using the skill a second time to slam both swords to the ground while still imbued with gravitational energy, creating a large explosion of the energy.
vanilla_info:
Bring the two swords together and roar into the skies, pulling in enemies with a gravitational wave.
Follow up with an additional input to slam down with gravity-infused swords.

name: Wave of Destruction
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Wave of Destruction</font>
mod_info: Raise the armament and imbue it with gravitational energy then slam it to the ground to cause a chain of large explosions of gravitational energy along the ground in a straight line.
vanilla_info: Raise the sword up high, then strike it against the ground to fire off a wave of gravitational force.

name: Bloodboon Ritual
mod_info:
Conjure an explosion of bloodflame energy above you which will then drip bloodflame down around you as you raise the armament into it to imbue it. Follow up by using the skill up to two more times to continue creating explosions. The armament will retain its bloodflame imbuement for 20 seconds, adding 30 <font color="#F48C25">fire damage</font>.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosion):</font> 100
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (drips):</font> 65
<font color="#C84343">Base blood loss accumulation (explosion and drips):</font> 60
vanilla_info:
Raise the sacred spear and pierce the body of the Formless Mother. Stab up to three times, creating explosions of blood with each thrust.
This skill will coat the armament with bloodflame for a while.

name: Flowing Form
mod_info: Convert the armament into a whip then do a very wide horizontal slash followed by a downward slam in front of you before returning it to its original form.
vanilla_info: Temporarily transforms armament into its liquid form. Swing the armament like a whip to strike surroundings before slamming its teardrop-shaped head down.

name: Blade of Death
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Blade of Death</font>
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with dark flame as you twirl in the air to do a downward horizontal slash, which also shoots a projectile outward from you. In addition to the damage from the attack, the enemy's <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> is reduced by 10% for 45 seconds, then they take damage equal to 0.45% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 5 seconds.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (projectile):</font> 180
vanilla_info:
Unleash the power of the Rune of Death to fire off a blade-like projectile.
In addition to dealing immediate damage, the blade reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP for a while.

name: Blade of Gold
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Blade of Gold</font>
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with golden energy as you twirl in the air to do a downward horizontal slash. As you slash in the air you will cast the golden energy off as a projectile with enough force to knock down some enemies.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (projectile):</font> 145
vanilla_info:
Leap into the air, charging the armament with golden flames that are then shot at the enemy as a single, blade-like projectile.
Inflicts holy damage.

name: Destined Death
mod_info: Imbue the armament with dark flame, then do a horizontal slash, followed by plunging the armament into the ground to release the dark flame as a flurry of slashes all around you. The flurry of slashes may knock down some enemies. In addition to the damage from the attack, the enemy's <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> is reduced by 10% for 45 seconds, then they take damage equal to 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds.
vanilla_info: Set free the remnants of Destined Death, plunging the greatsword into the ground to summon a myriad of blades. In addition to dealing immediate damage, this attack reduces the enemy's maximum HP and continues to wear down HP for a short time.

name: Spinning Wheel
mod_info: Push the wheel against the ground to cause it to start spinning then hold it out in front of you like a chainsaw. Hold to keep the wheel spinning. Can be used while moving.
vanilla_info: Strike the wheel against the ground to set it spinning at top speed. Hold to keep the wheel spinning. Can be used while walking to push the armament into enemies.

name: Alabaster Lords' Pull
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Alabaster Lord's Pull</font>
mod_info:
Plunge the armament into the ground and create a gravity well in a large area around yourself, which can pull some enemies towards you and stagger them.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 184
vanilla_info:
Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack pulls enemies in.
Has a greater area of effect than Gravitas.

name: Onyx Lords' Repulsion
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Onyx Lord's Repulsion</font>
mod_info:
Plunge the armament into the ground and create a gravity well in a large area around yourself, which can push some enemies away from you and knock them down.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 200
vanilla_info: Thrust the armament into the ground to create a gravity well. In addition to dealing damage, this attack sends enemies flying away.

name: Oath of Vengeance
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Oath of Vengeance</font>
mod_info: Channel an energy within you for 60 seconds. This increases your <font color="#E0B985">vigor</font>, <font color="#E0B985">mind</font>, <font color="#E0B985">endurance</font>, <font color="#E0B985">vitality</font>, <font color="#E0B985">strength</font>, <font color="#E0B985">dexterity</font>, <font color="#E0B985">intelligence</font>, <font color="#E0B985">faith</font>, and <font color="#E0B985">arcane</font> by 5. It also increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage negation</font> by 45% and lighter physical attacks from enemies may cause the enemy to briefly stagger backwards after hitting you.
vanilla_info: Swear an oath upon the greatsword to avenge the clan, temporarily raising all attributes for a certain duration. While the oath's effects are active, poise will also be increased.

name: Ice Lightning Sword
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Ice Lightning Sword</font>
mod_info:
Stomp as you raise the armament to imbue it with icy lightning, then slam it to the ground to conjure a bolt of icy lightning directly in front of you and a brief shockwave of lightning around you. The armament retains its imbuement for 45 seconds, which adds 160 <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font> and 80 <font color="#9DD7FB">frostbite accumulation</font>.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (bolt):</font> 149
<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (shockwave):</font> 69
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation (bolt and shockwave):</font> 70
vanilla_info:
Call down a bolt of ice lightning into the blade and bring it down upon a foe.
The ice lightning effect will persist for a while.

name: Regal Beastclaw
mod_info:
Slam the armament into the ground to shoot 5 claws along the ground in a cone-shaped pattern.

<font color="#F395C4">Base physical damage (claws):</font> 186
vanilla_info: Slam the hammer into the ground, rending the land asunder with the armament's five bestial claws.

name: Flame Dance
mod_info: Imbue the armament with fire and do 5 very wide horizontal slash with it.
vanilla_info: Imbue the red braid with the Giants' Flame and lash out in a wide range with a series of agile swings.

name: Claw Flick
mod_info: Inflate the armament to be much larger then flick it outward with enough force to knock down some enemies.
vanilla_info: Cause the finger to swell, then flex to build up strength before giving enemies an almighty flick.

name: Nebula
mod_info:
Twirl in the air as you imbue the armament with cosmic energy, then do a very wide horizontal slash which will leave a trail of dark clouds along its path. The dark clouds will explode after a short delay.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (explosions):</font> 121
vanilla_info:
Imbue the Naturalborn's stars with magic to perform a sweeping strike.
This attack leaves a dark cloud of stars in its wake that lingers briefly before exploding.

name: Ghostflame Ignition
mod_info:
Thrust the armament forward while you conjure a ball of ghostflame at the tip of it, which will then explode. Follow up with a normal attack to cause the explosion to produce a long trail of ghostflame. Alternatively, follow up with a strong attack to cause the explosion to be much larger.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (explosion):</font> 140	        <font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accum.:</font> 55
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (trail):</font> 60		        <font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accum.:</font> 65
<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (big explosion):</font> 200      <font size="9"> </font><font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accum.:</font> 80
vanilla_info:
Thrust out the barbed rod and set its tip alight with ghostflame.
Follow up with a normal attack to set the ground ablaze with ghostflame, or a strong attack to trigger a massive explosion.

name: Ancient Lightning Spear
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Ancient Lightning Spear</font>
mod_info: Transform the armament into a bolt of red lightning and throw it forward. Charging increases damage.
vanilla_info:
Imbue the armament with the ancient dragons' red lightning, then throw it as a spear.
Can be charged to increase its power.

name: Frenzyflame Thrust
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with the flame of frenzy then jump up and plunge it into the ground, which will create an explosion and 3 trails of frenzy flame in front of you. Using this skill causes <font color="#EEAA2B">madness accumulation</font> on yourself.

<font color="#EEAA2B">Madness:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100 and reduces FP equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum FP</font> plus 30. Only on Tarnished.
vanilla_info:
Imbue the spear with the flame of frenzy and leap forwards, plunging it into the ground and setting off a maddening explosion.
The skill inflicts both the enemy and the user with madness.

name: Miquella's Ring of Light
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Miquella's Ring of Light</font>
mod_info:
Imbue armament with golden energy then do a diagonal slash to cast it as a large ring of light projectile. Can be used repeatedly to continue casting rings of light.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 170
vanilla_caption: Unique Skill: Miquella's Ring of Light
vanilla_info:
Summon Miquella's shining halo and fire it forwards.
Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Golden Tempering
mod_info: Imbue the armament with holy essence for 60 seconds, which adds 100 <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font>. During this time your charged strong attack is changed to a flurry of quick thrusts with both swords.
vanilla_info:
Cross the two swords to grant their attacks holy essence.
While in effect, strong attack performs a dual-wielding combo attack.

name: Last Rites
mod_info: Imbue yourself and nearby allies with holy essence for 60 seconds, which adds 25 <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> to your armaments and increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 10%. Attacks against Those Who Live in Death will inflict 100% more damage and prevent them from reviving.
vanilla_info:
Raise the epitaph to grant the effect of Sacred Order to yourself and allies in the vicinity.
Particularly effective at laying to rest Those Who Live in Death.

name: Unblockable Blade
mod_info: Significantly extend the length of the blade and do a horizontal slash. This attack cannot be blocked.
vanilla_info:
Imbue the cipher blade with light, extending its length, then strike with a sudden sweeping attack.
This attack cannot be blocked.

name: Eochaid's Dancing Blade
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Eochaid's Dancing Blade</font>
mod_info: Imbue the armament with red energy and throw it forward to spin in the air like a drill for a short time before returning to you, then do a horizontal swipe. Charging increases damage, reach, and duration.
vanilla_info:
Infuse the sword with energy, then fling it forwards in a corkscrew attack. The sword continuously deals damage while violently spinning.
Charge the attack to increase reach and duration of the spin.

name: Corpse Wax Cutter
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Corpse Wax Cutter</font>
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with red energy then do a downward vertical slash to cast it as a projectile. In addition to the damage from the attack, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage (projectile):</font> 270
vanilla_info:
Lost skill of ancient heroes.
Lift the sword up high to release the power of corpse wax and launch it forwards as a blade-like projectile.

name: Zamor Ice Storm
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Zamor Ice Storm</font>
mod_info:
Plunge the armament into the ground to produce a swirl of frost around you.

<font color="#9DD7FB">Frostbite:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 10% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 30, then increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage received</font> by 20% for 30 seconds.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 110
<font color="#9DD7FB">Base frostbite accumulation:</font> 80
vanilla_info: Plunge the curved sword into the ground, building power before unleashing a freezing storm that batters the surroundings.

name: Radahn's Rain
mod_info: Hold to crouch in a prepared stance. Arrows shot while in this stance will be shot nearly straight up and split into a barrage of arrows which will arc to land around the area where the target was standing when the arrow was shot.
vanilla_info:
Archery skill performed from a low stance.
Ready the bow and fire a sudden flurry of arrows up into the sky. The arrows will pour on foes like rain.

name: The Queen's Black Flame
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: The Queen's Black Flame</font>
mod_info: Imbue the armament with a black flame and do a diagonal slash. In addition to the damage from the attack, the enemy will also lose 1% of their <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> per second for 2 seconds. Follow up by using the skill a second time to do another diagonal slash while the armament is still imbued with black flame.
vanilla_caption: Unique Skill: The Queen's Black Flame
vanilla_info: Set the blade ablaze with the god-slaying black flame before delivering a sweeping slash. Additional input allows for a follow-up attack. The black flames will continue to wear down HP for a while.

name: Dynast's Finesse
mod_info: Do a horizontal slash in a full circle around you as you back away from where you were standing. Follow up with a strong attack to lunge forward with a thrust attack. Follow that up by using another strong attack to step forward while doing a thrust then a horizontal slash.
vanilla_info: Nimbly avoid an attack, securing some distance from foes. Follow up with strong attack to perform a sudden lunge, and press strong attack again to perform a sweeping slice.

name: Magma Shower
mod_info:
Do a horizontal slash in a full circle around you as you scatter small pools of magma in a small area around you. Follow up by using the skill a second time to quickly do another spin, spreading more magma.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (magma):</font> 30
vanilla_info:
Slash at foes in a twirling motion while scattering magma all around.
Additional input allows for a follow-up attack.

name: Nebula
mod_info:
Conjure a wide arc of cosmic clouds in front of you, which will explode after a short delay.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 100
vanilla_info: Imbue the Naturalborn's wings with magic to send forth a dark cloud of stars that lingers briefly before exploding.

name: Death Flare
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with golden flames for 45 seconds, adding 65 <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage</font> and 30 <font color="#A17945">death blight accumulation</font> per attack. Follow up by using the skill a second time to do a downward vertical slash, which will create an explosion in front of you.

<font color="#A17945">Death blight:</font> Instant death. Only effective against Tarnished.

<font color="#A17945">Death blight accumulation (explosion):</font> 70
vanilla_info:
Set the lusterless sun ablaze with the Prince of Death's flames, inflicting the death ailment upon foes.
Follow up with an additional input to bring down the armament, triggering an explosion.

name: Bloodhound's Finesse
mod_info: Do a vertical slash in a full circle then jump back away from where you were standing. Follow up by using a strong attack to briefly turn invisible as you dash forward and do an upward slash.
vanilla_info: Slash upwards with the Bloodhound's Fang, using the momentum of the strike to perform a backwards somersault and gain some distance from foes. Follow up with a strong attack to perform the Bloodhound's Step attack.

name: Magma Guillotine
mod_info:
Leap forward and slam the armament into the ground to create a large pool of magma all around you. Follow up by using the skill a second time to reach forward and do a vertical slash, then drag the armament on the ground back to you.

<font color="#F48C25">Base fire damage (magma)</font> 35
vanilla_info: Grab the scalesword with both hands, as a wyrm would hold it in its mouth, and leap forwards, smashing it into the ground and triggering a blast of magma. Follow up with an additional input to perform a chopping attack.

name: Corpse Piler
mod_info:
Do 2 quick diagonal slashes. A trail of blood will follow along in front of your slashes, extending the reach of the attack. Follow up by using the skill a second time to do 3 more quick diagonal slashes. Follow that up by using another strong attack to do a downward vertical slash.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss accumulation (diagonal slashes):</font> 45
<font color="#C84343">Blood loss accumulation (downward slash):</font> 50
vanilla_info: Forms a blade of cursed blood for repeated, interweaving successive attacks. Follow up with an additional input for further successive attacks.

name: Transient Moonlight
mod_info:
Sheathe armament in preparation for an attack. Hold to keep weapon sheathed. Can be used while moving. Follow up with a normal attack to quickly step forward while doing a horizontal slash. Alternatively, follow up with a strong attack to do a small hop forward while doing a downward vertical slash. Both follow up attacks cast a wave of blue energy forward.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (normal projectile):</font> 140
<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage (strong projectile):</font> 155
vanilla_info:
Sheathe blade, holding it at the hip in a composed stance.
Follow up with either a normal or a strong attack to draw the blade at great speed for an instant slash attack. Both attacks fire off a wave of light.

name: Bloodblade Dance
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with blood then leap forward and do a flurry of quick slashes. Follow up by using the skill a second time to do another slash all around you as you back away.

<font color="#C84343">Blood loss:</font> Inflicts damage equal to 15% of <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font> plus 100.
