<font color="#C84343">Base blood loss accumulation:</font> 55
vanilla_info:
Leap at foe to perform a flurry of tornado-like attacks.
Follow up with an additional input to perform an attack that ends in an evasive maneuver.

name: Knowledge Above All
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Knowledge Above All</font>
mod_info: Raise the armament to imbue yourself and nearby enemies with a cursed energy for 60 seconds which reduces <font color="#57DBCE">magic damage negation</font> and <font color="#F5EB89">holy damage negation</font> by 10%.
vanilla_info: Raise the scepter to manifest the realm of the All-Knowing. Enemy magic and holy damage negation will be reduced for all within the area, including the caster.

name: Devourer of Worlds
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Devourer of Worlds</font>
mod_info: Plant the armament in the ground and release a wave of red energy in a very large area around you. Each enemy hit by this will restore 15% of your <font color="#E0B985">maximum HP</font>.
vanilla_info: Charge the scepter with magic and strike it against the ground to steal the HP of all nearby enemies.

name: Familial Rancor
mod_info: Raise the armament to release 7 spirits which will seek out enemies.
vanilla_info:
Gently rattle the copper heads to summon vengeful spirits that chase down foes.
The anguish of a spouse and children invites accursed wrath.

name: Rosus's Summons
mod_info: Summon 3 skeletons near you which will each do a single vertical swing of their sword, as you do as well, before disappearing. Together, the four of you will attack one fixed point in front of you from different angles.
vanilla_info:
Raise the axe aloft to summon those lost in death.
Three skeletons will appear at a distance and attack in tandem before vanishing.

name: Thunderstorm
mod_info:
Imbue the armament with lightning then swing it in circles around you to produce a swirl of wind and lightning around you. Follow up by using the skill up to two additional times to continue creating swirls of wind and lightning. The armament will retain its imbuement for 40 seconds, which adds 120 <font color="#FFE033">lightning damage</font>.

<font color="#FFE033">Base lightning damage (swirl):</font> 95
vanilla_info:
Imbue the armament's wing-blade with lightning and swing it around to create a tempestuous lightning storm. Follow up with an additional input to perform up to two spinning attacks.
The lightning will stay on the blade for a while.

name: Sacred Phalanx
mod_info: Imbue the armament with golden energy then do an upward vertical slash. Shortly after this a long, horizontal line of golden spears will emerge from the ground in front of you.
vanilla_info: Release the power of a hidden incantation to erect a palisade of golden spears frontwards.

name: Great-Serpent Hunt
mod_info: Take a moment to build up power then thrust the weapon forward. Follow up by using the skill a second time to do a strong upward vertical slash. While fighting a great serpent, a long blade of light will greatly extend the reach of this skill.
vanilla_info: Perform a powerful forward lunge and follow up with an upward thrust via additional input. When fighting a great serpent, a long blade of light will appear, revealing the armament's true power.

name: Angel's Wings
mod_info: Imbue the armament with light and do an upward slash as you jump into the air, then do a horizontal slash as you return to the ground. Enemies hit by this attack will be unable to use a Flask of Crimson Tears or Flask of Cerulean Tears for 20 seconds.
vanilla_info:
Jump and imbue the wing-blade of the armament with light, then deliver a slashing attack on the enemy.
The white wings impede recovery actions using a flask of tears.

name: Storm Kick
mod_info: Plunge the armament into the ground to produce a swirl of wind around you. Follow up with a strong attack to leap forward while imbuing the armament with lightning, then slam the armament into the ground to create a small explosion of lightning.
vanilla_info:
Thrust the prosthetic leg blade into the ground, creating a storm.
Follow up with a strong attack to perform a lightning-infused jumping attack.

name: Unblockable Blade
mod_info: Imbue the armament with light then thrust it forward. This attack cannot be blocked.
vanilla_info:
Imbue the cipher blade with light, then lunge forward with a sudden piercing attack.
This attack cannot be blocked.

name: Sorcery of the Crozier
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Sorcery of the Crozier</font>
mod_info:
Raise armament to conjure 8 small projectiles of glintstone magic around you which will seek out nearby enemies.

<font color="#57DBCE">Base magic damage:</font> 60
vanilla_caption: Unique Skill: Sorcery of the Crozier
vanilla_info: Channel magic into the glintstone to activate an ancient sorcery, producing floating magic projectiles that chase enemies automatically.

name: Erdtree Slam
mod_info: Jump up into the air and slam back to the ground on your butt to create a large shockwave of sacred energy around you which may knock down nearby enemies.
vanilla_info:
Jump up high into the air and crash down on the ground ahead. The resulting pratfall sends golden shockwaves in all directions.
This is the most powerful of all the Ground Slam skills.

name: Gravity Bolt
mod_info: Imbue the armament with gravitational lightning then raise the armament up to cast it at a target. Large rocks will emerge from the ground where it strikes. This attack may knock down some enemies. Can be used repeatedly.
vanilla_info:
Imbue the jaw of the fallingstar beast with gravitational lightning, sending a bolt crashing down a short distance away.
Can be fired in rapid succession.

name: Fires of Slumber
mod_caption: <font color="#C0B194">      Unique Skill: Fires of Slumber</font>
mod_info: Blow the torch's flame in a wide arc in front of you. If the flames touch the ground it will continue to burn on the ground for a short time.
vanilla_info:
Blow into the candlestick's flame, creating a stream of hazy purple fire to cover the ground ahead.
The intoxicating flames inflict the sleep ailment upon foes.

name: Golden Retaliation
mod_info:
Block with precise timing to absorb an incoming spell, convert it into golden energy, then cast it back at the target.

<font color="#F5EB89">Base holy damage:</font> 150
vanilla_info:
Ready the shield to unleash its protective incantation.
This will dispel sorceries and incantations, retaliating with golden power.

name: Contagious Fury
mod_info: Raise the armament to imbue yourself with red energy for 30 seconds, which increases <font color="#E0B985">all damage inflicted</font> by 20%.
vanilla_info:
Incite the jellyfish's wrath and allow its fury to flow through you.
Raises attack power for a certain duration.

name: Ordovis's Vortex
mod_info: Spin the armament vertically in the air behind you for a short time before slamming into the ground in front of you to produce a large shockwave. Charging increases damage.
vanilla_info:
Channel the power of the crucible to spin the entire sword in midair, building momentum before slamming the blade down onto the ground.
This skill can be charged to increase its power.

name: Spinning Weapon
mod_info: Imbue armament with glintstone magic then telekinetically lift it in front of you and spin it vertically several times. Can be used while moving.
vanilla_info:
Channel magic into the glintstone to suspend the scepter in mid air and cause it to spin violently.
Those it touches will suffer successive magic attacks.
